arguments.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner
Ownable: new owner is the zero a

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
A contract where a creator can set up milestones and other users can donate to
Reaching each milestone will unlock certain amount for creator and provide offchain
sources info that milestone is unlocked and certain info can be revealed to people who donated a minimum pledge

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Campaign: You don't have anything to withdraw"

arguments.value: Campaign: You don't have anything to withdraw

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Campaign: You don't have anything to withdraw"

documentation.text:
Lets the owner of the campaign to collect money for each milestone
or all the money of the contract if campaign is finished

A boolean flag that confirms whether a certain user can see
the content or not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

canSeeContent(uint256).notice: A boolean flag that confirms whether a certain user can see the content or not

collect().notice: Lets the owner of the campaign to collect money for each milestone or all the money of the contract if campaign is finished

userdoc.notice: A contract where a creator can set up milestones and other users can donate to Reaching each milestone will unlock certain amount for creator and provide offchain sources info that milestone is unlocked and certain info can be revealed to people who donated a minimum pledge
